Hi all,

I have two question regarding Heritrix 2:

1.) How do I request a =
crawl stop in a processor (innerProcess())?

I found the method requestCraw=
lStop() in the CrawlController but wasn't able to find out how I get to my =
CrawlController inside of a processor's innerProcess() method!?

----------=
------------------------------------------------------------

2.) I have a =
list which I instantiate in the initialTasks() method of one of my processo=
rs and I would like to make sure that this list is only accessed by one toe=
thread at a time (in the innerProcess() method of the referring processor o=
f the toethread). How can I make sure that this list is only accessed by on=
e toethread at a time?

I'm not really solid in multhithreading and this is=
 kinda new problem to me. I looked into wait() and notify() methods and som=
e general stuff but couldn't really figure something for Heritrix so I woul=
d appreciate any help on this!

Thanks for the help!!!

Georgie
